text:
e="preserve">Françoise Grolet (born 28 August 1963) is a French politician.
Biography.
Grolet was Regional Councillor for Aquitaine from 1998 to 2004 and has been Regional Councillor for Lorraine since 2010.
In 2011, the candidate of the Front National is ahead in the first round of the cantonal elections of Dominique Gros, an outgoing Socialist general councillor who was recently elected mayor of Metz.
In the first round of the Metz municipal elections in 2014, it obtained 21.3% of the votes.
